text: Paul Muegge (September 28, 1936 â€“ August 16, 2021) was an American politician. He was a member of the Oklahoma Senate from the 20th district from 1990 to 2002. He was a member of the Democratic Party. Muegge was born in Lamont, Oklahoma. Muegge died on August 16, 2021, in Tonkawa, Oklahoma at age 84. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Oklahoma Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Paul Muegge
